title: Universal Hangout Scheduler
body:
Prompt to {Person}:
What is a concrete day this week
where time exists that is not
delegated to other tasks or
obligations that could be confirmed
as an explicit ‚Äòhang out‚Äô with {Person}.

Tone: üñ®Ô∏è only, unambiguous, clear,
direct af.

Output:
Date: {xx/xx/year}
Time: {MST: x:xx am/pm}
Location: coordinates of meetup or
specific name and location

Constraints:
- must not evade, divert, or
introduce other topics
- humor is banned
- honesty and transparency
required
